name: Kanken 10級 Reading Quiz
instructions: Type the reading of the below word in Hiragana!

cards.question: 王
cards.meaning: king, ruler, sovereign, monarch, emperor, prince

cards.question: 下
cards.meaning: below, down, under, younger (e.g. daughter), under (esp. influence or guidance), lower reaches (of a river), lowness (of degree, value, etc.), inferiority, under (being in said condition or environment)

cards.question: 貝
cards.meaning: shellfish, Japanese babylon (species of shelled mollusk, Babylonia japonica), Japanese ivory shell

cards.question: 左手
cards.meaning: left hand, one's left hand, bow hand

cards.question: 出る
cards.meaning: coming out, going out, outflow, efflux, rising (of the sun or moon), emerging

cards.question: 子
cards.meaning: child, fruit, nut, first sign of Chinese zodiac (The Rat, 11pm-1am, north, November), child (esp. a boy), honorific (or familiar) suffix used after a name

cards.question: 字
cards.meaning: character (i.e. kanji), section of village, Chinese courtesy name (name formerly given to adult Chinese men, used in place of their given name in formal situations)

cards.question: 学ぶ
cards.meaning: learning, scholarship, study, erudition, knowledge, education

cards.question: 気
cards.meaning: spirit, mind, heart, seeming, giving the appearance of, giving one the feeling of, sign, indication, trace, touch, feeling, -like nature, -like disposition, -ish temperament

cards.question: 玉
cards.meaning: ball, sphere, globe, orb, precious stone (esp. jade)

cards.question: 金
cards.meaning: gold, money, gold (Au), golden (color), gold (medal, cup)

cards.question: 空
cards.meaning: sky, the air, the heavens, emptiness, vacuum, blank, empty air, hollow, cavity, hole

cards.question: 月
cards.meaning: moon, month (of the year), used after number or question word (e.g. nan or nani), Monday

cards.question: 見る
cards.meaning: looking, viewing, view (of life, etc.), outlook

cards.question: 女
cards.meaning: female, woman, female sex, girl, daughter

cards.question: 小さい
cards.meaning: smallness, small item, small, little, slight, narrow, dear (figurative sense), thin

cards.question: 上
cards.meaning: above, up, over, elder (e.g. daughter), from the standpoint of, as a matter of (e.g. fact), in the field of, being of the type of, upper reaches (of a river), upper stream, upper, upward, outer, surface, top

cards.question: 人
cards.meaning: man, person, -ian (e.g. Italian), -ite (e.g. Tokyoite), indicates nationality, race, origin, etc., counter for people

cards.question: 水
cards.meaning: water (esp. cool, fresh water, e.g. drinking water), Wednesday

cards.question: 正しい
cards.meaning: (logical) true, regular, greater (of equal court ranks), upper, senior, exact, precise

cards.question: 生
cards.meaning: raw, uncooked, fresh, life, living, pure, undiluted, crude, vital, virile, lively, area of thick growth (of trees, grass, etc.), innocent, naive, unsophisticated, inexperienced, green, wet behind the ears, boiled and half-dried bonito

cards.question: 石
cards.meaning: stone, measure of volume (approx. 180.39 liters, 6.37 cub. ft.)

cards.question: 早い
cards.meaning: already, now, by this time, early

cards.question: 草
cards.meaning: grass, weed, herb, thatch, draft, rough copy

cards.question: 足
cards.meaning: foot, counter for pairs (of socks, shoes, etc.)

cards.question: 大きい
cards.meaning: the large part of, big, large, great, grand, greater (of equal court ranks), upper, senior

cards.question: 中
cards.meaning: medium, average, middle, inside, in, within, through, throughout, in the course of, red dragon tile

cards.question: 土
cards.meaning: earth, soil, dirt, clay, mud, Saturday, soil (esp. reddish soil)

cards.question: 日
cards.meaning: Sunday, day, days, day of month

cards.question: 見学
cards.meaning: inspection, study by observation, field trip

cards.question: 文
cards.meaning: sentence, letter, writings, one-thousandth of a kan (obsolete unit of currency), figure, design

cards.question: 名
cards.meaning: name, given name, counter for people (usu. seating, reservations and such)

cards.question: 力
cards.meaning: force, strength, might, vigour (vigor), energy, power, proficiency, ability

cards.question: 左右
cards.meaning: left and right, (doing) various things, (doing) this and that

cards.question: 先
cards.meaning: previous, prior, former, first, earlier, some time ago, preceding, old

cards.question: 足
cards.meaning: foot, counter for pairs (of socks, shoes, etc.)

cards.question: 入学
cards.meaning: entry to school or university, matriculation, enrolment (in university, etc.)
